artscaler_master_roadmap.project_name: ArtScaler - The Ultimate eBay Canvas Art Intelligence Platform
artscaler_master_roadmap.goal: Become the #1 market research and optimization tool for eBay canvas art sellers

fixes.name: eBay API Integration Repair
fixes.description: Market Scanner returns zero results. Must fix before any other work.
root_cause_analysis: Sandbox API keys being used instead of production credentials
Rate limiting not respected (5,000 calls/day limit)
Error handling missing for API failures
Data parsing from JSON responses may be incorrect
tasks: Replace sandbox API keys with production eBay Finding API credentials
Implement proper authentication flow with OAuth 2.0
Add comprehensive error handling for API failures
Create retry logic with exponential backoff (1s, 2s, 4s, 8s, max 30s)
Set up rate limiting to respect eBay's 5,000 calls/day limit
Add API response logging and monitoring
Test with 50+ different canvas art search queries
Validate data parsing from eBay JSON responses
Create fallback mechanisms for API downtime
Document all API endpoints and their usage
Implement background jobs for async eBay API calls
Use cron jobs for periodic data refresh
acceptance_criteria: Market Scanner returns 10+ results for 'abstract canvas painting'
Pricing History shows completed sales data
No API errors in production logs for 24 hours
Response time under 3 seconds for all queries
95th percentile latency under 2 seconds
Rate limit warnings logged when approaching 80% daily quota

fixes.name: Dashboard Data Population
fixes.description: Dashboard shows all zeros - no data flowing through system
root_cause_analysis: Dashboard metrics not connected to data sources
No default state for new users with zero data
tasks: Connect dashboard metrics to live eBay data streams
Implement real-time Global Pulse calculation algorithm
Create background jobs to aggregate market data every 15 minutes
Add 'Getting Started' state for new users with zero data
Show aggregate eBay market stats even before user scans
Create demo data toggle for testing (admin only)
Add data refresh timestamps to all metrics
Implement caching layer for faster dashboard loads (5-min TTL)
Use Server-Sent Events or polling for real-time updates
Implement incremental data loading for large datasets

database_changes: Add market_snapshots table for historical data

tracked_volume.description: Number of active listings being monitored

acceptance_criteria: Global Pulse shows actual market sentiment score (not 0)
Tracked Volume updates as user adds searches
Active Alerts display when WVS >= 7.0 detected
Market Value calculates based on user's tracked listings
Dashboard loads in under 1.5 seconds
New users see helpful onboarding prompts instead of zeros

fixes.name: Remove Test/Debug Elements
fixes.description: Production site shows 'Test eBay Scraper' and sandbox references
tasks: Remove 'Test eBay Scraper (API)' section from dashboard
Hide all sandbox/test terminology from UI
Clean up all console.log statements (replace with proper logging)
Remove debug flags from production build
Create separate staging environment for testing
Implement feature flags for gradual rollout
acceptance_criteria: Zero 'test' or 'sandbox' references visible to regular users
Professional production-ready interface
No console.log output in production
Admin panel only accessible to authenticated admins
Developer tools accessible at /admin/dev-tools

fixes.name: eBay Fee Calculation Accuracy
fixes.description: Verify profit calculator uses correct eBay fee structure
tasks: Add tiered fee calculation for sales over $7,500
Add eBay Store discount calculations (4-15% fee reduction)
Add Promoted Listings fee calculator (2-20% ad rate)
Update fees automatically when eBay changes rates
Add fee calculator for different countries (UK, Canada, Australia)
Store fee schedules in database for easy updates
Create admin interface for fee schedule management

database_changes: Add ebay_fee_schedules table with effective dates

acceptance_criteria: Fees match eBay's official calculator within $0.01
Category-specific fees applied correctly
Store discounts calculated accurately for all tiers
Fee updates can be made via admin panel without code deployment
Calculator shows breakdown: final value fee, per-order fee, store discount

fixes.name: Performance Optimization
tasks: Implement lazy loading for all images (Next.js Image component)
Code-split JavaScript bundles by route (Next.js automatic)
Minify and compress all CSS/JS assets
Implement service worker for offline capability
Add browser caching headers for static assets
Optimize database queries (add indexes for common queries)
Implement virtual scrolling for large lists (react-window)
Implement resource preloading for critical assets
Add performance monitoring with Web Vitals
Enable Edge Runtime for API routes where possible

database_indexes: CREATE INDEX idx_scraped_listings_created ON scraped_listings(created_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_opportunities_wvs ON opportunities(wvs_score DESC)

acceptance_criteria: Lighthouse performance score > 90
Dashboard loads in < 1.5 seconds
Market Scanner results appear in < 3 seconds
No layout shift during page load
Works offline with cached data

phase_1_foundation.name: Core Functionality & User Experience
phase_1_foundation.goal: Make the app usable and trustworthy

features.name: Interactive First-Run Experience
features.description: Guide new users through their first scan and teach them how to use the platform
tasks: Create welcome modal with value proposition video
Build 5-step interactive tutorial with progress tracking
Add contextual tooltips for all metrics (WVS, ROI, etc.)
Show sample results before user runs first scan
Add 'Help' button with video walkthrough on every page
Add celebration animation when first scan completes (confetti)
Implement user onboarding checklist stored in database
Track onboarding completion rates in analytics
features.user_story: As a new seller, I want to understand how to use the tool within 5 minutes so I can start getting insights immediately

features.name: Comprehensive Help System
features.description: In-app documentation and learning resources
tasks: Create metric glossary (WVS, Global Pulse, Velocity, ROI)
Build FAQ section with 30+ common questions
Add video tutorials for each major feature (5-8 videos)
Add live chat support widget (Crisp or Intercom)
Build knowledge base articles for common issues
Create eBay selling best practices library
Implement in-app search for help articles
Add contextual help buttons on every page
ui_components: Video player with chapters and timestamps

WVS.description: Measures demand intensity by analyzing watcher accumulation rate, bid activity, and listing age. Higher scores indicate stronger buyer interest.

interpretation.0-3: Low demand - consider different pricing or keywords

Global_Pulse.description: Overall health indicator for the canvas art market. Combines average WVS, listing growth rate, and sell-through rate.

interpretation.0-30: Bear market - buyer activity is low

ROI.description: Profit as a percentage of total costs including materials, eBay fees, and shipping.

Sell_Through_Rate.description: Percentage of listings that result in a sale within 30 days.

features.user_story: As a seller, I want to understand what each metric means so I can make informed decisions

features.name: Show Data Sources & Freshness
features.description: Build trust by showing where data comes from and how recent it is
tasks: Add 'Last updated: X minutes ago' to all data displays
Show sample sizes: 'Based on 847 active listings'
Add 'Powered by eBay Finding API' attribution (required by eBay)
Show data refresh schedule and next update time
Add manual refresh button with rate limiting (once per 5 min)
Display API status indicator (green=working, yellow=degraded, red=down)
Create data methodology page explaining calculations
Show data coverage: '94% of canvas art market'
ui_components: Timestamp badges with relative time (5 minutes ago)
Refresh button with loading spinner and cooldown timer
Data quality badge (A/B/C rating or High/Medium/Low)
features.user_story: As a seller, I want to know my data is current and reliable so I can trust the recommendations

features.name: Comprehensive Error Management
features.description: Graceful handling of failures with helpful user messaging
tasks: Create user-friendly error messages for all API failures
Add retry buttons for failed operations
Implement offline mode with cached data
Show loading states for all async operations (skeleton loaders)
Add error logging to monitoring service (Sentry)
Create status page for system health (status.artscaler.com)
Add email notifications for critical errors (admin)
Build error recovery suggestions: 'Try searching a different keyword'
Implement error boundaries in React components
Add graceful degradation for non-critical features

api_timeout.message: The request is taking longer than expected. Please try again.

rate_limited.message: You've made too many requests. Please wait a moment.
rate_limited.action: Show countdown timer until next allowed request

no_results.message: No listings found for this search. Try broader keywords.

auth_expired.message: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
auth_expired.action: Redirect to login with return URL

network_error.message: Unable to connect. Check your internet connection.
network_error.action: Show cached data if available, retry button

server_error.message: Something went wrong on our end. We're looking into it.
server_error.action: Log error, show status page link, retry button

features.user_story: As a seller, when something goes wrong, I want clear guidance on what to do next

features.name: Build User Confidence
features.description: Add elements that establish credibility and trustworthiness
tasks: Add seller testimonials with photos and results
Create 'About Us' page with founder story
Show social proof: '1,249 scans run today'
Add case studies of successful sellers
features.user_story: As a potential customer, I want to know this is a legitimate tool created by real people

features.name: Clear Feature Labels & Pricing
features.description: Remove confusion about feature labels and tier requirements
tasks: Create clear badge system: FREE, PRO, EMPIRE
Add feature lock icons for premium features
Create pricing comparison page with feature matrix
Add 'Upgrade to unlock' modals for locked features
Show feature availability in sidebar navigation
Add tier badge to user profile header
features.user_story: As a user, I want to clearly understand which features I can access with my current plan

phase_2_canvas_art_specialization.name: Canvas Art-Specific Intelligence
phase_2_canvas_art_specialization.goal: Differentiate from generic eBay tools with art-specific features

features.name: Canvas Size Intelligence
features.description: Deep insights into which canvas sizes sell best and at what prices
tasks: Show profit per square inch metric
Calculate optimal size for different styles
Add framed vs. unframed size analysis
features.user_story: As a canvas painter, I want to know which sizes sell best so I can create inventory that moves faster

features.name: Color Palette Trend Tracker
features.description: Analyze which color combinations are trending on eBay
tasks: Implement AI color extraction from listing images
Create color trend graphs over time
Show seasonal color shifts (warm in fall, cool in summer)
Build color palette generator for trending combinations
Add 'Hot Colors This Week' widget to dashboard
Show which colors command premium prices
features.user_story: As a painter, I want to know which colors are trending so I can create art that buyers want

features.name: Advanced Style Analytics
features.description: Deep dive into art style performance and trends
tasks: Expand style categories beyond current 5 to 20+
Add sub-style tracking (geometric abstract, fluid abstract, etc.)
Add technique tracker (palette knife, pour, brush, etc.)
Show subject matter trends (ocean, mountain, abstract, etc.)
Create style mashup analyzer: 'Abstract + Geometric + Blue'
Add style recommendation based on market gaps
features.user_story: As a versatile artist, I want to know which styles to focus on to maximize sales

features.name: Canvas Shipping Cost Calculator
features.description: Precise shipping calculations for different canvas sizes and types
tasks: Build canvas dimension to shipping cost calculator
Calculate rolled canvas vs. stretched shipping
Show optimal shipping method by size
Create flat rate box fit calculator
Add international shipping costs (UK, Canada, Australia, EU)
features.user_story: As a seller, I want accurate shipping costs so I can price competitively without losing money

features.name: Art Supply Cost Database
features.description: Track material costs to calculate true profit margins
tasks: Create database of canvas prices by size and quality
Add paint cost tracking (acrylic, oil, watercolor)
Show cost per painting by complexity
Track material cost trends over time
features.user_story: As a seller, I want to track my material costs so I know my true profit margins

features.name: Artist Branding Suite
features.description: Tools to build and maintain artist brand identity
tasks: AI Brand Generator (name, tagline, color palette)
Thank You Card Generator with QR codes
Artist Bio Writer with AI assistance
features.user_story: As an artist, I want professional branding materials to establish credibility and encourage repeat buyers

phase_3_market_intelligence.name: Advanced Market Research Tools
phase_3_market_intelligence.goal: Provide competitive intelligence and market positioning insights

features.name: Competitor Analysis Suite
features.description: Track and analyze competing sellers in the canvas art space
tasks: Build seller watchlist feature (track up to 50 sellers)
Show competitor listing volume over time
Alert when competitors list new items

metrics_tracked.listing_volume: Number of active listings per seller

features.user_story: As a seller, I want to understand my competition so I can find gaps in the market

features.name: Seasonal Trend Analyzer
features.description: Understand how demand changes throughout the year
tasks: Track back-to-school and college decor spikes
Show summer vs. winter color preferences
features.user_story: As a seller, I want to know when to create and list certain types of art

features.name: Dynamic Pricing Engine
features.description: AI-powered pricing recommendations based on real-time market data
tasks: Add auction vs. fixed price recommendations
Show price history for similar items

pricing_strategies.premium: Price 20-30% above market average for unique pieces
pricing_strategies.competitive: Match market average for faster sales
pricing_strategies.penetration: Price 10-20% below market for new sellers
pricing_strategies.auction: Use auctions for rare or highly demanded items

features.user_story: As a seller, I want data-driven pricing to maximize both sales and profit

features.name: Keyword Intelligence Center
features.description: Deep analysis of keywords that drive sales
tasks: Show keyword combinations that work together
features.user_story: As a seller, I want to use the best keywords to get my listings seen by buyers

features.name: eBay Cassini SEO Optimizer
features.description: Optimize listings for eBay's search algorithm
features.user_story: As a seller, I want to optimize my listings so they rank higher in eBay search

phase_4_monetization.name: Business & Revenue Features
phase_4_monetization.goal: Enable sustainable business operations and revenue tracking

features.name: Complete Payment Integration
features.description: Full subscription management with multiple payment options
tasks: Add Stripe as backup payment processor
Add cancellation flow with exit survey

features.name: Tier Limit Enforcement
features.description: Track and enforce subscription tier limits
tasks: Implement daily scan counter per user
Implement soft limits with upgrade prompts
Add usage reset at midnight UTC

features.name: Inventory & Sales Tracker
features.description: Track listings, sales, and inventory

features.name: Enhanced eBay Integration
features.description: Deep integration with eBay selling tools
tasks: Implement eBay OAuth for account linking

phase_5_scale.name: Scale & Growth Features
phase_5_scale.goal: Features for power users and business growth

features.name: Smart Automation Suite
features.description: Automate repetitive tasks for power sellers
tasks: API access for Studio Empire tier

automation_types.schedule_scan: Run market scans on a schedule
automation_types.price_alert: Alert when price drops below threshold
automation_types.competitor_alert: Alert when competitor lists new item
automation_types.auto_reprice: Adjust price based on market conditions

features.name: Advanced Reporting & Export
features.description: Comprehensive reports and data export
tasks: Add CSV export for all data

features.name: Team & Collaboration
features.description: Multi-user features for teams and studios

roles.owner: Full access to all features and billing
roles.analyst: View and analyze data, no editing
roles.artist: View data related to their work only

features.name: Developer API Access
features.description: RESTful API for integrations and custom tools

features.name: Mobile App (PWA)
features.description: Progressive Web App for mobile users

features.name: Community & Learning Hub
features.description: Build a community of canvas art sellers

ui_design_system.name: Premium UI/UX Design System
ui_design_system.description: Create a stunning, professional interface that wows users
design_principles: Vibrant accent colors (electric blue, magenta, gold)

security.name: Security Best Practices
measures: Row Level Security (RLS) on all database tables

pre_launch: All critical fixes completed (FIX-001 to FIX-005)
Payment processing tested with real cards
